messages.message:
Hi, 
 
One of our client looking for a .net Developer and the location would be Scottsdale, AZ.
 
It’s a great opportunity that offers a very competitive salary plus bonus
I ran across your profile, and was hoping we could connect. 
 
Regards, 
 
Nicole Parker
Hi Brian, Thank you for your response. Can you please give me best time and number to reach out you so that we can discuss more insights of this opportunity?
And it is dimensional Thinking. It is a staffing company.
